case.title: Do you love wearing heels? are you Asian? (and single...) - 29 (Greenwich Village)
case.text:
We should talk then, chances are we'll fancy each other. (Maybe you think the heel thing is silly, but to me it's just a way to filter out the not-so-girly gals out there.)
I'm an attractive and tall (6'1 ft) White man, living and working downtown manhattan. I have dark hair and a slim body, love playing sports and staying active. I'm also quite friendly and fun to spend time with.
I do well with the ladies in normal social settings, but I'm newly single and thought this could be worth a shot. So let's talk? Shoot me an email.
